Uses of Interface
com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper.CompletionHandler

  • Packages that use CompletionHandler 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper
    Helper classes which allow the developer to easily make calls between the 'conversation' services, (Conversation, Speech to Text and Text to Speech).

    • Uses of CompletionHandler in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper

      Methods in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper with parameters of type CompletionHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConversationHelper.sendText(String message, CompletionHandler<ConversationResponse> handler)
      Send a text message to the Conversation.
      void ConversationHelper.sendText(String message, Map<String,Object> context, CompletionHandler<ConversationResponse> handler)
      Send a text message and some existing context to the Conversation.
      void ConversationHelper.sendVoice(File voice, CompletionHandler<SpeechResults> handler)
      Send a voice file for transcription to the SpeechToText service.
      void ConversationHelper.sendVoice(File voice, CompletionHandler<SpeechResults> handler, RecognizeOptions options)
      Send a voice file for transcription to the SpeechToText service.
      void ConversationHelper.synthesize(String text, CompletionHandler<InputStream> handler)
      Sends a text message to the TextToSpeech service for conversion to a stream of audio data.
      void ConversationHelper.synthesize(String text, CompletionHandler<InputStream> handler, Voice voice)
      Sends a text message to the TextToSpeech service for conversion to a stream of audio data.
